job.title: Software Engineer

validating new ways of measuring and understanding human potentialppbrppWhat does it mean to be sciencedriven We rigorously test our offerings and never market tools that do not meet our high standards for predicting job performance accurately and fairlyppbrppModern Hires innovative platform allows diverse data sources to be analyzed and understood like never before We are combining the predictive power of assessment interview technology advanced analytics and artificial intelligence into an allinone solution to create a fairer more efficient hiring process that provides a better candidate experience and better outcomesppbrppstrongThe rolestrongppbrppAs a Software Engineer with Modern Hire you will be responsible for the development of a web based rich media service for the HRRecruitment industry In this role you will work with a team of developers to continue development of an ASPNET cloud based web and mobile applications using C Web API jQuery and other web related technologies You will also work closely with architects product managers and designers to drive and implement changes to extend its feature set and improve usability scalability performance and client side technologies CSS JavaScript to create lightweight cross browsercross platform interfaces using the latest methodologiesliliWork with service contracts and APIs to integrate 3rd party features andor servicesliliCreate interfaces that are simple aesthetic and user friendly where code is driven from user experience requirementsliliWork with existing code and refactor as necessary or appropriate given time and resource constraintsliulpbrppstrongIf you can answer yes to the following then we want you to applystrongpppulliDo you have at least two 2 years of experience in software engineering developmentliliAre you willing to learn and use new technologiesliliDo you have working knowledge of relational database theory and experience with Microsoft SQL Server 2012 or laterliliDo you have working knowledge of web application security design and current secure design and coding practicesliliDo you have experience with SQL databaseliliAre you selfmotivated and committed to
